channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Promoted Builds (Simple) Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Promoted Builds (Simple) Plugin

item.title: CVE-2022-25202|2024-08-03T04:36:06.532Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20promoted%20builds%20%28simple%29%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Promoted Builds (Simple) Plugin 1.9 and earlier does not escape the name of custom promotion levels, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exploitable by attackers with Overall/Administer permission.

item.title: CVE-2022-30965|2024-08-03T07:03:39.922Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20promoted%20builds%20%28simple%29%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Promoted Builds (Simple) Plugin 1.9 and earlier does not escape the name and description of Promotion Level parameters on views displaying parameters, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exploitable by attackers with Item/Configure permission.
